commit.message:
re PR target/53877 (__lzcnt_u16/__lzcnt_u32/__lzcnt_u64 aren't implemented)

2012-07-20  Kirill Yukhin  <kirill.yukhin@intel.com>

        (_lzcnt_u64): Ditto.
